rules.natural: If the research facility receives government grant funding, then the research achieves a breakthrough
If the organization submits a clinical trial application, then the organization completes pre-clinical testing
If the organization completes pre-clinical testing, then the clinical trial receives regulatory body approval
If the organization develops an alternative compound, then researchers identify side effects
If researchers identify side effects, then researchers observe adverse reactions
If researchers identify side effects, then researchers do not modify the drug formulation
If researchers observe adverse reactions, then researchers modify the drug formulation
The platform achieves commercial success or the research achieves a breakthrough
If the platform faces market competition, then the platform does not achieve commercial success
If the research facility receives corporate grant funding, then the research achieves a breakthrough
If the company invests in a marketing campaign, then the platform faces market competition
The company implements a price reduction or the company launches a promotional offer
If the company launches a promotional offer, then under the condition that the company does not invest in a marketing campaign, the platform gains market share
If the company analyzes market data, then should the company implement a price reduction, given that the company does not invest in a marketing campaign, the platform gains market share
The company analyzes market data or the company conducts a consumer survey
If the company conducts a consumer survey, then whenever the company implements a price reduction and the company does not invest in a marketing campaign, the platform gains market share
If the material contains alcohol, then the material requires special storage
The material contains alcohol or the research achieves a breakthrough
The material degrades at room temperature or the material does not require special storage
If the research facility conducts research on plant extracts, then the research facility receives government grant funding
If the research facility conducts research on synthetic compounds, then the research facility receives corporate grant funding
If the research facility synthesizes plant extracts into drug compounds, then research on plant extracts does not progress
The research facility synthesizes plant extracts into drug compounds or the research facility conducts research on plant extracts or the research facility conducts research on synthetic compounds
If the organization publishes a research paper, then the research achieves a breakthrough
The organization publishes a research paper or the organization presents conference findings
If neither the platform receives regulatory approval nor the research achieves a breakthrough, then the organization develops an alternative compound
If it is not the case that filing a patent extension by the organization leads to extended patent protection, then the patent is challenged by generic manufacturers
If it is not the case that filing a patent extension by the organization leads to extended patent protection, then the patent is not challenged by generic manufacturers

rules.prover9_expression: (-(synthesizes(Facility, PlantExtract, DrugCompound) -> progresses(Research, PlantExtract)) -> designed(ManufacturingProcess, PlantExtract))
rules.natural: If synthesizing plant extracts into drug compounds by the research facility does not result in progress of research on plant extracts, then a manufacturing process for plant extracts is designed
If synthesizing plant extracts into drug compounds by the research facility does not result in progress of research on plant extracts, then a manufacturing process for plant extracts is not designed
If presenting conference findings by the organization does not lead to research breakthrough, then the organization submits a clinical trial application

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(presents(Organization, ConferenceFindings) -> achieves(Research, Breakthrough)) -> approved(ClinicalTrial, RegulatoryBody)) -> files(Organization, PatentExtension))
rules.natural: If the failure of presenting conference findings to lead to research breakthrough does not result in clinical trial approval by the regulatory body, then the organization files a patent extension

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(presents(Organization, ConferenceFindings) -> achieves(Research, Breakthrough)) -> approved(ClinicalTrial, RegulatoryBody)) -> -extends(Organization, PatentProtection))
rules.natural: If the failure of presenting conference findings to lead to research breakthrough does not result in clinical trial approval by the regulatory body, then the organization does not extend patent protection

facts.natural: The clinical trial does not receive regulatory body approval
The platform does not receive regulatory approval
The platform does not gain market share
The material does not degrade at room temperature
